text: I've been there many times, they always provide good service and excellent food. I'm not a person who likes to comment, but I have to say this is a nice place to have a meal with your friends
Great place for a quick inexpensive meal. Service is quick and friendly. Try the noodles with sesame oil and green onions.
nice service? special south China style, very rare and unique, and unbelievable good, prices are reasonable, definitely would go back!
